Troubleshooting

The following are some common errors that have been encountered with installation and working with the development environment and how to fix them:

error TS2307: Cannot find module... after running npm start

If there is no dist directory in your Symbiota2 installation, or if this directory is empty, there was likely an issue with the execution of npm install on your system. This could be from running the command as the root user (or with sudo). To correct this either run npm install again not as the root user, or run npm run package_all_plugins to build the plugins specifically.
